room_000.name: The Nexus
room_000.description: A cozy campfire with crackling logs, little sparks drifting up into the sky, soft moss underfoot.

room_001.name: The Observatory
room_001.description: A quiet space with transparent walls revealing the vast digital expanse beyond. Constellations of data flow past like stars.

room_002.name: The Garden of Forking Paths
room_002.description: Multiple corridors branch off in impossible directions. Each path seems to lead somewhere different every time you look.
